name: process_electric_baseboard

arguments.name: selectedliving
arguments.display_name: Which is the living space zone

arguments.name: selectedfbsmt
arguments.display_name: Which is the finished basement zone

arguments.name: userdefinedeff
arguments.display_name: The efficiency of the electric baseboard

modeler_description: This measure parses the OSM for the HeatingSeasonSchedule. Any existing baseboard convective electrics are removed from any existing zones. An HVAC baseboard convective electric is added to the living zone, as well as to the finished basement if it exists.
description: This measure removes any existing electric baseboards from the building and adds electric baseboards.
